description.raw:
This fixes all xenial cppcheck errors! (I just noticed a [bunch in zesty](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-default-zesty-amd64-gpu-none/16/cppcheckResult/) :crying_cat_face:)

* 7212c4e: mark some gazebo/common constructors as explicit; basically anything that seemed reasonable and didn't cause any problems

* 221cf6b: suppress some noExplicitConstructor warnings about EnumIterator, SubMesh, Time, and URI constructors. The `SubMesh` one is a little weird because it's kinda like a copy constructor but it takes a pointer instead of an object. The [SubMesh class in ign-common](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/src/7a9b1ee092b5e7419722cd9de5dd205a56c09fba/include/ignition/common/SubMesh.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default#SubMesh.hh-72) has a normal copy constructor, so I suppress the error instead of marking as explicit. The Time class uses the implicit constructor for double all over the place, so I gave suppressions to each of those constructors just to be safe. The `EnumIterator` and `URI` constructors also are used implicitly in a few places ([here](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/9840e93de641b5c1bc5ab9008be1817867a2ec3b/gazebo/physics/World.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#World.cc-2923) for URI), so I gave them suppressions.

* fea2556: suppress unusedStructMember complaints in GpuLaserDataIterator.hh since they are used in another file

* fec2b8d: remove redundant assignment of copy variable
description.html:
This fixes all xenial cppcheck errors! (I just noticed a bunch in zesty )

  • 7212c4e: mark some gazebo/common constructors as explicit; basically anything that seemed reasonable and didn't cause any problems

  • 221cf6b: suppress some noExplicitConstructor warnings about EnumIterator, SubMesh, Time, and URI constructors. The SubMesh one is a little weird because it's kinda like a copy constructor but it takes a pointer instead of an object. The SubMesh class in ign-common has a normal copy constructor, so I suppress the error instead of marking as explicit. The Time class uses the implicit constructor for double all over the place, so I gave suppressions to each of those constructors just to be safe. The EnumIterator and URI constructors also are used implicitly in a few places (here for URI), so I gave them suppressions.

  • fea2556: suppress unusedStructMember complaints in GpuLaserDataIterator.hh since they are used in another file

  • fec2b8d: remove redundant assignment of copy variable
